[[Category:LaTeX]]
== Equation Service ==

*[[Equation Service]]: a program that uses pdflatex to produce small PDF files containing equations and other text.


== Grapher ==

Use the pre-installed Grapher in /Applications/Utilities/. It's free and can be used as an input device for math formulas, as this screenshot shows: [http://www.uoregon.edu/~noeckel/Keynote.html link]

http://www.uoregon.edu/~noeckel/computernotes/GrapherScreenShot.jpg
